request.description: Upload a single image file. Returns image path for use in room creation. Files are auto-resized to multiple sizes (128x128, 256x256, 512x512, 1024x1024, 1920x1080).

exec: // Save first image path as primary for testing

request.description: Upload multiple image files at once. Returns array of image paths for use in room creation. Automatically sets Postman variables for room image testing.

item.description: File upload endpoints for images used in rooms, buildings, and user avatars. All uploads are automatically optimized and resized to multiple sizes.
